summary: This mod is a direct affront to the the drab, dingy, colourless and humourless world of Skyrim
descriptionHtml:
Humour in Skyrim?

This mod is what I call a direct affront to the drab, dingy, colourless, and humourless 
world of Skyrim.

We tried to make it the least \"immersion-damaging\" as possible.  The content introduced in 
all probability never existed in historical times similar to SKyrim...but it COULD have 
existed.

This is probably not a mod to be retained as a permanent mod, but we had fun making it and 
thought we would share it anyway.

I\'m not going to spoil the mod by giving everything away.  But with this mod installed the 
player encounters various billboards along the roads of Skyrim advertising \"unusual\" 
products and where they can be obtained.

SIDENOTE:  This mod does have a gay reference.  My roommate (who designed it) is gay and 
felt it was appropriate.

==========================
INSTALLING/UNINSTALLING
==========================

Installing follows the usual procedure of unpacking with \"7-zip\" (or similar), and dragging 
and dropping the contents of the mod into your \"....skyrim/data/\" folder.  

Or a mod manager can be used.

To uninstall, delete the files (listed below) installed by the mod.  Or use your mod manager 
if it supports uninstalling.

==========================
FILES
==========================
SkyrimHumour.esp
meshes/clutter/billboards/dragonnogbillboard.nif
meshes/clutter/billboards/forrentbillboard.nif
meshes/clutter/billboards/gaybladebillboard.nif
meshes/clutter/billboards/kneearrowsbillboard.nif
meshes/clutter/DragonNog/dragonnog.nif
meshes/weapons/gay/1stpersonsteelgreatswordgay.nif
meshes/weapons/gay/steelgreatswordgay.nif
meshes/weapons/knee/kneearrow.nif
meshes/weapons/knee/kneearrowflight.nif
Textures/clutter/billboards/billboard_n.dds
Textures/clutter/billboards/dragonnogbillboard.dds
Textures/clutter/billboards/forrentbillboard.dds
Textures/clutter/billboards/gaybladebillboard.dds
Textures/clutter/billboards/kneearrowsbillboard.dds
Textures/clutter/DragonNog/dragonnog.dds
Textures/clutter/DragonNog/dragonnog_em.dds
Textures/clutter/DragonNog/dragonnog_n.dds
Textures/weapons/gay/steelclaymoregay.dds
Textures/weapons/knee/steelarrowknee.dds

==========================
CREDITS and PERMISSIONS
==========================
Brad Meeks...most of the inspiration, artwork.
Andrew Clements...most (maybe all) of the grunt work, some artwork.
Bethesda...game, creation kit.

Anyone is welcome to use any part of this mod however they would like.  No permissions or 
credits are needed.
author: Andrew Clements and Brad Meeks
